text: "Churchill Downs" is a song off American rapper Jack Harlow's second studio album Come Home the Kids Miss You. The song was released on May 6, 2022. The song also features Drake. On June 1, 2022, a music video for the song was released. It was filmed at the 2022 Kentucky Derby. The song was nominated for Best Rap Song at the 65th Grammy Awards but lost to Kendrick Lamar's The Heart Part 5. ==References== ==Other websites== *"Churchill Downs" on YouTube Category:2022 songs Category:Drake (musician) songs Category:Jack Harlow songs
title: Churchill Downs (song)
